commitResults.messageTitle: Add task management feature and changed user input handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Changed ChinChin.java to simplify input handling to use switch-case
- Changed CustomList.java to manage task states and display formatted output
- Changed CUstomList.java from ArrayList<String> to ArrayList<Task>
- Added feature for user to "mark <number>" and "unmark <number>"
- Added Task.Java for a task class

commitResults.messageTitle: Added support for tracking Todo, Deadline and Event
commitResults.messageBody:
- Renamed Task.java to Todo.java
- Modified Todo Class to display the Task's tag at the front
	- [T] for Todo
	- [D] for Deadline
	- [E] for Event
- Created Deadline class which inherits from Todo Class for tasks with deadlines
- Created Event class which inherits from Todo Class for Events

commitResults.messageTitle: Automating the testing of text UIs
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated input.txt to contain sample user commands
- Updated EXPECTED.txt to capture expected outputs based on corresponding inputs
- Updated runtest.sh to test the inputs properly

- Created ChinChinException.java for custom exceptions
- Modified ChinChin.java to capture incorrect inputs by user, i.e:
	- No task's description
	- Deadline task with no deadline
	- Event task with no "from" and "to"
	- "mark" and "unmark" followed by a non-integer input

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for deleting task from the list
commitResults.messageBody:
- Modified ChinChin.java to allow user to "delete" task
- Modified CustomList.java to support the deletion of task
- Modified Event.java to improve the UI

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor task tag implementation to use TaskType enum
commitResults.messageBody:
Task tags are currently implemented as hardcoded strings in the code ([T], [D], [E]).

Hardcoded tags makes the code harder to maintain or extend in future.

Switch tagging mechanisms across all tasks ('Task', 'Deadline', 'Event') to use enumeration called TaskType.

This improves code clarity, reduces duplication and makes future extensions easier.

Replace hardcoded task tags with an enumeration ('TaskType')

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Storage class and refactor existing Java files for improvements
commitResults.messageBody:
- New class
	- Added a new 'Storage.class' for managing task data storage and retriefval in the application.

- Refactoring
	- Updated 'ChinChin.java' to utilise the new Storage class for improved modularity.
	- Enhanced 'CustomList.java' to ensure that all task modifications are reflected.

These changes improve code organisation, readability and adheres to the Java coding standards.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' into master to intergrate saving functionality.
commitResults.messageBody: This merge integrates the newly developed 'Storage' class into the master branch.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DateFormatter class and improve task, deadline and event parsing
commitResults.messageBody:
- New Class:
	- Create 'DateFormatter' that holds all possible accepted formats for user input.
	- Can be edited to add more formats

- Improve parsing:
	- Update 'Deadline' and 'Event' class to utilise the new 'DateFormatter' for parsing dates.
	- Convert the input strings into actual 'LocalDateTime' objects instead of treating them as plaintext.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor codebase to improve OOP design and extract classes
commitResults.messageBody:
- Extract 'ChinChinUI' class for managing user interactions.
- Extract 'Storage' class for handling file I/O operations,
- Extract 'ChinChinParser' class for parsing user commands into executable actions.
- Create abstract 'ChinChinCommand' base class with child classes:
	- "AddCommand", "DeleteCommand", "ExitCommand", "ListCommand", etc.
	- Simplified command execution logic through polymorphism.
- Refactor 'ChinChin' class to align with the new structure.

- Group related classes into logical Java packages:
  - Move main application-related files (e.g., ChinChin, ChinChinException) into `chin.main`.
  - Move user interface-related files (e.g., ChinChinUI) into `chin.ui`.
  - Move task-related files (e.g., Task, Deadline, Event, TaskType) into `chin.task`.
  - Move command classes (e.g., AddCommand, DeleteCommand, ExitCommand) into `chin.command`.
  - Move files handling logic (Storage.java) into `chin.storage`.
  - Move util files (ChinChinParser.java) into `chin.util`.
